entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Schefferville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:48 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
